about_the_game:
Rage and rampage as a fast zombie mob!

First, they killed you. Then, they brought you back. Now you're loose and it's time for some sweet, sweet, blood-soaked payback! Kill 'em, baby! Kill 'em all!

Just click where you want the zombies to go, and the ones in range will attack nearby enemies automatically.

03/29/24 Added hotkeys 1-5 for easy weapon selection

3-5 hour game.

FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and trippy audio visualizations. THESE EFFECTS ARE ON BY DEFAULT ON THE START SCREEN and can be toggled on or off from the SETTINGS menu or the PAUSE menu at any time. If you are sensitive to flashing lights you should turn them off immediately.


Slammin' soundtrack includes The Gobs, Citric Dummies, GEE TEE, Thee Windom Earles, Redshift, Dope Sweater, Checkpoint, BEEF, Prison Affair, The Zombie Dandies, Voodoo Puppets, Untimely Dosage, Sovran, The Hydeouts, Punk Rock Opera, Sept, No Brains, Safety Pins, Bass Feens, Hawt Denim, Los Pecadores, Vampire Death, and more!

content_descriptors.notes: There's blood. Lots of blood. Splishy splashy bloodiness everywhere. And sometimes heads pop off. And shoot up in the air. With blood. Which is really more funny than it is gory, but yeah. Blood.

detailed_description:
Rage and rampage as a fast zombie mob!

First, they killed you. Then, they brought you back. Now you're loose and it's time for some sweet, sweet, blood-soaked payback! Kill 'em, baby! Kill 'em all!

Just click where you want the zombies to go, and the ones in range will attack nearby enemies automatically.

03/29/24 Added hotkeys 1-5 for easy weapon selection

3-5 hour game.

FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and trippy audio visualizations. THESE EFFECTS ARE ON BY DEFAULT ON THE START SCREEN and can be toggled on or off from the SETTINGS menu or the PAUSE menu at any time. If you are sensitive to flashing lights you should turn them off immediately.


Slammin' soundtrack includes The Gobs, Citric Dummies, GEE TEE, Thee Windom Earles, Redshift, Dope Sweater, Checkpoint, BEEF, Prison Affair, The Zombie Dandies, Voodoo Puppets, Untimely Dosage, Sovran, The Hydeouts, Punk Rock Opera, Sept, No Brains, Safety Pins, Bass Feens, Hawt Denim, Los Pecadores, Vampire Death, and more!
name: Go Go Zombies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 5100 (Integrated graphics card)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It'll probably run on a potato if the potato has enough RAM and resolution is set to 1280.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800 8-Core Processor 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 6600 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the specs of the machine the game was developed on. Kinda doubt you need this much computer to play at 1920x1080 60fps...
